I do my laundry once a week, because that is enough to keep my clothes clean and fresh.

I spent my birthday alone, but I still made it a relaxing and enjoyable day.
i just moved to los angeles from tokyo.

content.text: Nice to meet you, how are you doing today?
Hello! I am doing well, thank you for asking. How about yourself?
I am doing well too. Thanks for asking. I just moved to Los Angeles from Tokyo and I am still getting used to the new place.
Oh wow, that must be a big change! How do you like it so far?
It's been a lot of fun, but it can also be a bit overwhelming at times.
I can imagine! I have never been to Tokyo, but I have heard it is a beautiful city.
It is! I miss it a lot, but I am excited to start this new chapter in my life.
I am sure you will do great things here! What are your plans for the future?
I am not sure yet, but I am open to anything. I am just happy to be here and to have the opportunity to explore a new city.
That is great! I am sure you will find your way. Do you like to watch tv?
Yes, I love to watch tv! What are some of your favorite shows?
I like to watch a lot of different shows, but my favorites are probably The Office, Parks and Recreation, and Modern Family.
I love all of those shows! I also really like Brooklyn Nine-Nine and The Good Place.
Those are great shows too! I am glad we have similar taste in tv.
Me too! It is always nice to find someone who enjoys the same things you do.
I agree! It is nice to meet you, and I hope we can talk again soon.
It was nice to meet you too! I hope so too.
